name: pinelab-storefront-client
description: Generates static html pages with Gridsome and suplied Vue components
author: Martijn van de Brug <martijn@pinelab.studio>

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && yarn scss && yarn tsc && yarn copyfiles -u 1 'src/ministore/**/*' 'src/static/*' lib
scripts.serve: nodemon --verbose --ext js,ts --watch src --watch test --ignore test/src/.temp --ignore test/.cache --exec 'yarn build && yarn serve:gridsome'
scripts.serve:gridsome: cd test && yarn upgrade pinelab-storefront-client && yarn gridsome develop
